infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow Book a Pro to use your location for finding nearby service providers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to use your location for finding nearby service providers.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to use your location for finding nearby service providers.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to access your photos for profile pictures and service images
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to access your camera for profile pictures and service images
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to access your microphone for video consultations
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Book a Pro to access your contacts for easier booking with friends and family.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Book a Pro to use your location for finding nearby service providers.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Book a Pro to access your photos for profile pictures and service images.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow Book a Pro to access your contacts for easier booking with friends and family.
